column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The body of an unidentified woman was found floating on the banks of the Tonle Sap River.------This incident occurred at 3 am on 26 April 2020 on the Tonle Sap river in Group 7
column5: Sangkat Chroy Changva.------The woman was reported to have two stab wounds.------According to sources at the scene
column6: fishermen could smell a foul odour when coming into shore and found the woman’s body near the water’s edge.------Police have opened a murder investigation. ------POST NEWS
